articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
吴说获悉，Balancer 发推表示，Balancer 在得知 Euler 攻击后，立马确定了最佳的行动方案，将 bbeUSD（Euler boosting USD）和所有包含 bbeUSD 的池子暂停并进入恢复模式，并由紧急 subDAO 执行。在黑客入侵时，大约 1190 万美元从 bbeUSD（Euler enhanced USD）池中发送给 Euler，这占据相关池子 TVL… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1635308950802558976

Balancer: Because of actions taken by Euler, it is not currently possible to transfer eTokens. Any funds in bbeUSD cannot be withdrawn at this time but LP’s retain ownership of both the eTokens and unwrapped equivalents (eg: eDAI/DAI).

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
吴说获悉，据 BlockSec 分析，Euler 本次被盗的根本原因是由于在 donateToReserves() 函数中缺少对流动性（健康系数）的检查。黑客的攻击逻辑大致如下：1、从 Aave 闪电贷 $30M DAI；2、往 Euler 存入 20M 并获得等额抵押品通证 eDAI；3、利用 Euler 的杠杆借贷，黑客可铸造 195M eDAI 和 200M… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1635281633053114370

BlockSec: 1/ @eulerfinance is attacked. The root cause is due to the lack of liquidity check in the function donateToReserves()
https://phalcon.xyz/tx/eth/0xc310a0affe2169d1f6feec1c63dbc7f7c62a887fa48795d327d4d2da2d6b111d?line=471&debugLine=471
See the detailed attack steps below. https://t.co/TDbYuzVWHe

Our answer is $HOPE⚡️, a distributed stablecoin.

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description:
Re 吴说获悉，据 @nake13 采访 @Zac_Aztec 的内容，Aztec 回应关闭 Aztec Connect ：Aztec 未被监管机构联系，关闭是商业层面的考虑，且 Aztec Connect 的维护成本不低； 团队正专注于下一代默认隐私的可编程智能合约协议 Noir，仍然关注于 Layer2，而不是 Layer1；Noir 使用比特币风格的 UTXO… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1635243726703570945

Zhixiong Pan: 作为 http://zk.money 第一批用户，感到非常遗憾。
于是我采访了 @Zac_Aztec ，想了解公告之外的信息。
TL;DR:
1. Aztec 未被监管机构联系，关闭 Connect 是商业上的考虑；
2. Aztec Connect 的维护成本不低；
3. 仍然关注于 Layer2，而不是 Layer1。
等等。
全文：https://chainfeeds.substack.com/p/aztec-connect-l2-rollup

articles.description:
昨天：卖了。我卖掉了我所有的一切。我拥有的每一枚硬币都不见了。我完全退出了加密，我再也受不了了。激进的倾销、操纵，一切都那么激烈。
今天：买了。我买回了我卖掉的一切。我拥有的每一枚硬币都回来了。我完全重返了加密，我还能接受更多。激进的购买、巨大的泵，一切都那么享受。
通用汽车

🌝 网络维权事件频发 https://twitter.com/falconUSA11/status/1634897238144196608

Falcon capital#OTC: 2023年最大的一刀来自这个诈骗犯.@justinsuntron ，11月份我们投资部在寻找优质项目的时候考虑到了HT，于是联系到了孙宇晨，没想到他恰好与我们的主管Steve认识，他与Steve进行了沟通，经过他的一番吹嘘，我们在高点8美金的时候从他手里买入了2亿美元的HT，从11月7日开始，他一直在进行砸盘套利. https://t.co/lTLRV3igPb

articles.description:
Re @balajis So basically like this?
https://twitter.com/jerallaire/status/1635059046784077826?s=12&t=0uweMFpIb--7o0D1lpRH1Q

Jeremy Allaire: Indeed, the Payment Stablecoin Act, which remains a very active pursuit for Congress, would enshrine in law a regime where stabelcoin funds would be held with cash at the Fed and short-term T-Bills.  We need this law now more than ever if we want a truly safe financial system.

Principles for how we will live for the next 100 years.

articles.author: DeFi Educator
articles.description:
RT Balaji
Thinking this through, it’s the type of government-caused crisis that could lead to a CBDC.
Because I don’t know how businesses could practically operate with only a $250k max in each account.
They’d have to keep buying and selling T-bills. Instead they’d want to somehow send… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1634553488700223488

Naval: If businesses lose money on deposit, then every business in the country will move all cash above $250K into Treasuries and we’ll have a system-wide bank run at Twitter speed. 
They’ll tell their banker, “the only counterparty I want is the US Treasury.”

articles.description:
Based Kraken

Kraken Exchange: 3/3 Operation Chokepoint 2.0 might have overplayed its hand this time but the threat remains. They will continue to attack the rails, products and companies facilitating direct crypto ownership and DeFi use.
The People's Money is our peaceful revolution.
This is why we #Bitcoin
